titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Church of England from the foul aspersions of schism and heresie unjustly cast upon her by the Church of Rome. In two parts
titleStmt.author: Altham, Michael, 1633-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.H. for Luke Meredith, at the King's Head at the west end of St. Paul's Church-Yard,
